div.p: Grace and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.

Nikolaus Balbanus, our dearest brother and elder of the church, is going to request something from you in the name of all of us, which we indeed most earnestly desire to obtain and greatly need. We ask you, in your kindness, to listen to the man graciously and to give him your full trust. Farewell, most excellent and upright men.

May the Lord Jesus Christ be with you, may He increase and enrich you and your church more and more each day with His divine blessings, and may He make your labor in it fruitful. Geneva, on the first day of September, 1557.
